餥字的基本解释

餥
fēi
古代中国陈、楚一带人们相见后请吃麦饭称“餥”。

餥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēi］
［《廣韻》甫微切，平微，非。］
［《廣韻》府尾切，上尾，非。］
(1)以麦粥招待客人。
(2)引申为以酒食招待客人。
(3)一种面制食品。

餥字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　餥； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1422第07
【廣韻】【集韻】?府尾切，音匪。【說文】餱也。【爾雅·釋言】餥，食也。【揚子·方言】?楚之内相謁食麥饘曰餥。　又【廣韻】甫微切【集韻】【韻會】匪微切，?音非。又【集韻】方未切，音沸。義?同。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】陳楚之閒相謁食麥飯曰餥。〕　謹照原文之閒改之内。麥飯改麥饘。
餥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
餥字的起名意思

暂无。

Gluttonous
Basic explanation of words
Gluttonous
fēi
In ancient China, people from Chen and Chu area met each other to eat wheat and rice, which was called "餥".
Gluttonous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fēi]
["Guangyun" is slightly cut, flat and non-existent. ]
["Guangyun" Fu tail cut, upper tail, non. ]
(1) Entertain guests with porridge.
(2) The extension is to entertain guests with wine and food.
(3) A kind of noodle food.
Gluttonous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Shizi Department】　餥; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1422 Page 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fu tail cut, sound bandit. [Said the text] Haoya. 【Erya·Interpretation】Taste, eat too. [Yangtze Dialect]? Chu's inner minister greeted Mai Dian and said gluttony.　[Guangyun] again micro-cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] bandits micro-cut,? The sound is not. [Jiyun] The side is not cut, the sound is boiling. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] Chen Chuzhi greeted me with wheat and rice and said delicious food. 〕　I would like to follow the original text within the leisure reform. Maifan changed to Maidian.
